attributes.action: Limit the time which anyone has to admit/deny liability for causing harm in any way to another.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having been involved in a situation where there is blame to be established, and having felt anguish over no liability being accepted, I feel that there should be a statutory maximum time of not more that one month for all parties involved in a claim against another party, to state their position with regard to liability.  This would go a long way to relieving the stress and 'not knowing' for everyone involved and facilitate a speedy resolution to the question of compensation, thus enabling all parties involved to 'put the situation behind them' and continue with 'normal life'.
